name: Splataroo
description:
Splataroo

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0. Theme: Failure is Progress

Splataroo is a two player minigame where you have to try to die to spray your blood.

When the timer runs out or all the map is covered, whoever has the most blood on the map wins.

Music: https://www.zapsplat.com/

SFX:
https://freesound.org/people/thecheeseman/sounds/44429/
https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/

There are many bugs and it is quite rushed, but I hope you still enjoy.
